dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5184 IH: Affordable Housing Over Mandating Efficiency Standards Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Houchin (for herself and Mr. Flood) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To prohibit the Secretary of Energy from enforcing energy efficiency standards applicable to manufactured housing, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Affordable Housing Over Mandating Efficiency Standards Act or the Affordable HOMES Act.

section.header: Repeal of authority to establish standards for manufactured housing

paragraph.text: The Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007 (42 U.S.C. 17071) is amended by striking section 413.
The table of contents in section 1(b) of the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007 is amended by striking the item relating to section 413.

subsection.text: The final rule titled Energy Conservation Program: Energy Conservation Standards for Manufactured Housing published by the Department of Energy in the Federal Register on May 31, 2022 (87 Fed. Reg. 32728), shall have no force or effect.
